page.title: 16N.MOOR FARM-ROUTINE & ANIMAL
page.content:
{DAILY ROUTINE:- 1. FEEDING - morning and afternoon 2. CLEANING OUT & DISINFECTING (a high pressure washer is used) 3. MOVING PIGS to necessary pens 4. WASHING SOWS before farrowing 5. INJECTING pigs with iron and vitamins; against disease such as erysipelas; and to cure enteritis, etc. N.B. every pig is checked by the farmer in the evenings and the necessary injections are given. The injecting is done on the farm using drugs purchased from the local vet.
{OTHER ANIMALS:- 2 ponies for riding; 5 Ross Ranger hens and 5 bantams: house egg supply; 1 sheep dog-works cattle; 1 Jack Russell-ratter; 3 cats; 2 guinea pigs; 2 terrapins
